page.title: 17MEDICAL SERVICES IN CONNEL
page.content: Almost 3000 people in an area of 500 square miles around Connel are looked after medically by 2 doctors and 1 trainee helped by 1 secretary and 2 practice nurses who also do records, reception and dispensing in 2 full time surgeries at Connel and Taynuilt plus 2 part time ones at Bonawe and Dalavich.They work closely with local services such as district nurses, health visitors,ambulances,laboratory, x_ray,physiotherapy,speech therapy, dentists,opticians,chiropodists, pharmacies and 5 local hospitals giving surgical,medical,maternity and geriatric care.They have use of all specialist facilities in the region. Full up_to_date records are kept both manually and by computer.
